title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, which indicate them as user input targets. Moreover, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds that make them stand out even more.
EB: The text fields in the Project Properties Info page should be created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. This change would allow users to select and copy the values from these fields.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the text fields with automatic borders on motif platforms.
4. Compare the backgrounds of these text fields on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms.
